name: UIInterfaceOrientationMask
desc: Constants that specify a view controllerâ€™s supported interface orientations.

items.name: static var portrait: UIInterfaceOrientationMask
items.desc: The view controller supports a portrait interface orientation.

items.name: static var landscapeLeft: UIInterfaceOrientationMask
items.desc: The view controller supports a landscape-left interface orientation.

items.name: static var landscapeRight: UIInterfaceOrientationMask
items.desc: The view controller supports a landscape-right interface orientation.

items.name: static var portraitUpsideDown: UIInterfaceOrientationMask
items.desc: The view controller supports an upside-down portrait interface orientation.

items.name: static var landscape: UIInterfaceOrientationMask
items.desc: The view controller supports both landscape-left and landscape-right interface orientation.

items.name: static var all: UIInterfaceOrientationMask
items.desc: The view controller supports all interface orientations.

items.name: static var allButUpsideDown: UIInterfaceOrientationMask
items.desc: The view controller supports all but the upside-down portrait interface orientation.

items.name: init(rawValue: UInt)
items.desc: Creates a new instance with the specified raw value.
